src/serial/ll-dgr-src/main.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Driver for the dual grid implementation of the Lee-Lin multiphase LBM using D2Q9 discretization and periodic boundary conditions. For details:

Journal of Computational Physics 206: 16-47, 2005.

Serial Implementation. Convergence test and post-processing functions designed for single drop/bubble cases.
